info.title: MaveDB API
info.description:
MaveDB is a public repository for datasets from Multiplexed Assays of Variant Effect (MAVEs),
such as those generated by deep mutational scanning (DMS) or massively parallel reporter assay (MPRA) experiments.

get.description: List the current user's access keys.

schema.title: Response List My Access Keys Api V1 Users Me Access Keys Get

post.description: Create a new access key for the current user.

delete.description: Delete one of the current user's access keys.

get.description: Describe the API version.

schema.title: Response Search Doi Identifiers Api V1 Doi Identifiers Search Post

get.description: Fetch a single experiment set by URN.
List experiments.

schema.title: Response List Experiments Api V1 Experiments  Get
Response Search Experiments Api V1 Experiments Search Post

post.description: Search experiments created by the current user..

schema.title: Response Search My Experiments Api V1 Me Experiments Search Post

get.description: Fetch a single experiment by URN.

delete.description:
Delete a experiment .

Raises

Returns
_______
Does not return anything
string : HTTP code 200 successful but returning content
or
communitcate to client whether the operation succeeded
204 if successful but not returning content - likely going with this

get.description: Get all score sets belonging to an experiment.

schema.title: Response Get Experiment Score Sets Api V1 Experiments  Urn  Score Sets Get

get.description: Fetch a single publication by db name and identifier.
List distinct journal names, in alphabetical order.

schema.title: Response List Publication Journal Names Api V1 Publication Identifiers Journals Get

post.description:
Search external publication identifiers via a TextSearch query.
Technically, this should be some sort of accepted publication identifier.

schema.title: Response Search External Publication Identifiers Api V1 Publication Identifiers Search External Post
Response Search Raw Read Identifiers Api V1 Raw Read Identifiers Search Post

get.description: List reference genomes.

get.description: List distinct reference genome organism names, in alphabetical order.

schema.title: Response Search Score Sets Api V1 Score Sets Search Post

post.description: Search score sets created by the current user..

schema.title: Response Search My Score Sets Api V1 Me Score Sets Search Post

get.description: Fetch a single score set by URN.

delete.description:
Delete a score set.

Raises

Returns
_______
Does not return anything
string : HTTP code 200 successful but returning content
or
communitcate to client whether the operation succeeded
204 if successful but not returning content - likely going with this

get.description: Return scores from a score set, identified by URN, in CSV format.

200.description: Variant scores in CSV format, with four fixed columns (accession, hgvs_nt, hgvs_pro, and hgvs_splice), plus score columns defined by the score set.

get.description: Return counts from a score set, identified by URN, in CSV format.

200.description: Variant counts in CSV format, with four fixed columns (accession, hgvs_nt, hgvs_pro, and hgvs_splice), plus score columns defined by the score set.

get.description: Return mapped variants from a score set, identified by URN.

schema.title: Response Get Score Set Mapped Variants Api V1 Score Sets  Urn  Mapped Variants Get

post.description:
Upload scores and variant count files for a score set, and initiate processing these files to
create variants.

schema.title: Response List Target Gene Categories Api V1 Target Genes Categories Get

AdminUser.title: AdminUser
AdminUser.description: User view model containing properties to return to admin clients.

AdminUserUpdate.title: AdminUserUpdate
AdminUserUpdate.description: View model for updating current user, for admin clients.

CurrentUser.title: CurrentUser
CurrentUser.description: User view model for information about the current user.

CurrentUserUpdate.title: CurrentUserUpdate
CurrentUserUpdate.description: View model for updating the current user.

License.title: License
License.description: License view model containing properties visible to all users.

SavedUser.title: SavedUser
SavedUser.description: Base class for user view models representing saved records.

ScoreSet.title: ScoreSet
ScoreSet.description: Score set view model containing most properties visible to non-admin users, but no variant data.

ScoreSetCreate.title: ScoreSetCreate
ScoreSetCreate.description: View model for creating a new score set.

ScoreSetUpdate.title: ScoreSetUpdate
ScoreSetUpdate.description: View model for updating a score set.

ShortLicense.title: ShortLicense
ShortLicense.description: License view model containing a smaller set of properties to return in list contexts.

ShortScoreSet.title: ShortScoreSet
ShortScoreSet.description:
Score set view model containing a smaller set of properties to return in list contexts.

Notice that this is not derived from ScoreSetBase.

ShortTargetGene.title: ShortTargetGene
ShortTargetGene.description: Target gene view model containing a smaller set of properties to return in list contexts.

TargetGene.title: TargetGene
TargetGene.description: Target gene view model containing a complete set of properties visible to non-admin users.

TargetGeneCreate.title: TargetGeneCreate
TargetGeneCreate.description: View model for creating a new target gene.

User.title: User
User.description: User view model containing properties visible to non-admin users.
